Text: Dude! thank you so damn much!!! i don't know ho w you found this anime, as i am not big on anime. But this.... this is da shit!!!!!
You're all welcome... 15 more episodes and an OVA still coming!!!

Hey Qbort,

First, thanks for uploading these. Appreciated. 

However, I'm having difficulty finding episodes 8 and 9, and they don't seem to show up either in the search or your own torrents. Have you in fact uploaded them, or am I just looking in the wrong places?

Thanks again.

MrCanuck, you just need to search for the shows original Japanese title.  Adding the English title at the end was just something I did for uploading here so you won't see it on the others.

http://thepiratebay.sx/search/[gg]%20Shingeki%20no%20kyojin/0/99/0

k1ng_ruLz was quick to upload episodes 8 and 9... and might possibly beat me to more in the future, so just bookmark the link above and you shouldn't have a problem. :D
this anime puts all others to shame. every episode just gets better

QborT, when you say there are 15 more episodes coming, is that how many are planned for the whole series?

I seem to be having trouble finding any solid information on how long it's supposed to be, if the source manga is still running, etc.

Exevier, to the best of my knowledge all 25 episodes will be aired as season 1 (but I could be wrong of course).  And the OVA will be released in December (side story about Ilse Langner journal/notebook)

The Manga is still currently running (started in 2009 and just released #46 a couple days ago).
QborT, gotcha! Thanks for the information and the uploads, of course!
